title: Clay Economies
content:
Any clues? I went through all the usual suspects but the ’5’ is throwing me off every time.

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/clay\_04.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054756/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/clay_04.jpg "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/clay\_04.jpg")
author: bobbygrotesk

comments.content: It’s [Granjon](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054756/http:/www.linotype.com/505/granjon-family.html), with enlarged bold oldstyle figures for the “50” and regular lining figures for the smaller text.

Excellence,

Thank you so much, what a beautiful font.

-Bobby
